item.title: Github使用GPG对Commit进行签名
item.description:
<p>如何使用GPG对Commit进行签名，并配置Github。</p>
<h2 id="概述" class="heading-element"><span>概述</span>
 <a href="#%e6%a6%82%e8%bf%b0" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>使用GPG，可以在本地对提交进行签名。这些提交在GitHub上标示为已验证，便于其他人信任更改来自可信的来源，如下图，在Github中可看到<code>Verified</code>标记。</p>
<p><figure><img loading="lazy" src="./image/github-gpg.png" alt="QQ_1727026062967" srcset="./image/github-gpg.png?size=small, ./image/github-gpg.png?size=medium 1.5x, ./image/github-gpg.png?size=large 2x" data-title="QQ_1727026062967" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></figure></p>
<h2 id="配置步骤" class="heading-element"><span>配置步骤</span>
 <a href="#%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%ae%e6%ad%a5%e9%aa%a4" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h3 id="安装-gpg" class="heading-element"><span>安装 GPG</span>
 <a href="#%e5%ae%89%e8%a3%85-gpg" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p><code>macOS</code>可使用<code>homebrew</code> 进行安装</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">brew install gpg</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><div class="details admonition note open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title">
 <i class="icon fa-solid fa-pencil-alt fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>注意<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>
 </div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content">下述步骤基于<code>gpg (GnuPG) 2.4.5;</code></div>
 </div>
 </div>
<h3 id="生成gpg密钥对" class="heading-element"><span>生成GPG密钥对</span>
 <a href="#%e7%94%9f%e6%88%90gpg%e5%af%86%e9%92%a5%e5%af%b9" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">gpg --full-generate-key</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>该命令会提示指定密钥类型、密钥大小、密钥有效时长，默认值即可。命令结果示例如下</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">[keyboxd]
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">---------
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sec ed25519/39395E89396199AD 2024-09-22 [SC]
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> D0A0C14574AD709997634CE439395E89396199AD
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">uid [ 绝对 ] Huxley &lt;1469025384@example.com&gt;
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ssb cv25519/1823F843E3B49C5F 2024-09-22 [E]</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>其中<code>39395E89396199AD</code>即为私钥，<code>1823F843E3B49C5F</code>即为公钥。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">gpg --armor --export &lt;私钥id&gt;</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>再运行该命令即可看到以<code>-----BEGIN PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----</code>开头、以<code>-----END PGP PUBLIC KEY BLOCK-----</code>结尾的一段内容。</p>
<div class="details admonition note open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title">
 <i class="icon fa-solid fa-pencil-alt fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>注意<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>
 </div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content">要求你输入电子邮件地址时，请确保输入 GitHub 帐户的经过验证的电子邮件地址。</div>
 </div>
 </div>
<h3 id="检查现有gpg密钥" class="heading-element"><span>检查现有GPG密钥</span>
 <a href="#%e6%a3%80%e6%9f%a5%e7%8e%b0%e6%9c%89gpg%e5%af%86%e9%92%a5" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">gpg --list-secret-keys --keyid-format<span class="o">=</span>long</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>该命令列出你拥有其公钥和私钥的长形式GPG密钥。</p>
<h3 id="github中添加gpg密钥" class="heading-element"><span>Github中添加GPG密钥</span>
 <a href="#github%e4%b8%ad%e6%b7%bb%e5%8a%a0gpg%e5%af%86%e9%92%a5" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>在GitHub任意页的右上角，单击个人资料照片，然后单击<code>Settings</code>进入设置</p>
<p><figure><img loading="lazy" src="./image/github-gpg-1.png" alt="github-gpg-1" srcset="./image/github-gpg-1.png?size=small, ./image/github-gpg-1.png?size=medium 1.5x, ./image/github-gpg-1.png?size=large 2x" data-title="github-gpg-1" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></figure></p>
<p>在<code>SSH and GPK keys</code>设置中点击<code>New GPG key</code></p>
<p><figure><img loading="lazy" src="./image/github-gpg-2.png" alt="github-gpg-2" srcset="./image/github-gpg-2.png?size=small, ./image/github-gpg-2.png?size=medium 1.5x, ./image/github-gpg-2.png?size=large 2x" data-title="github-gpg-2" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></figure></p>
<p><code>Title</code>自定义取个名字，将<code>gpg --armor --export &lt;私钥id&gt;</code>的内容复制到<code>Key</code>中，保存。</p>
<h3 id="将签名密钥告知-git" class="heading-element"><span>将签名密钥告知 Git</span>
 <a href="#%e5%b0%86%e7%ad%be%e5%90%8d%e5%af%86%e9%92%a5%e5%91%8a%e7%9f%a5-git" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git config --global --unset gpg.format
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git config --global user.signingkey &lt;私钥id&gt;</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>若要将Git配置为默认对所有提交进行签名，请输入以下命令：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git config --global commit.gpgsign true</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>如没有配置该项，在<code>git commit -S</code>也可对提交进行签名</p>
<h2 id="其他" class="heading-element"><span>其他</span>
 <a href="#%e5%85%b6%e4%bb%96" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h3 id="删除gpg密钥对" class="heading-element"><span>删除GPG密钥对</span>
 <a href="#%e5%88%a0%e9%99%a4gpg%e5%af%86%e9%92%a5%e5%af%b9" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">gpg --delete-secret-keys &lt;私钥id&gt; <span class="c1"># 删除私钥</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">gpg --delete-keys &lt;公钥id&gt; <span class="c1"># 删除公钥</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>先删除了私钥，才能删除公钥</p>
<h2 id="报错" class="heading-element"><span>报错</span>
 <a href="#%e6%8a%a5%e9%94%99" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><div class="details admonition failure open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title">
 <i class="icon fa-solid fa-times-circle fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>失败<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>
 </div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content"><p>error: gpg failed to sign the data:</p>
<p>gpg: signing failed: Inappropriate ioctl for device</p>
</div>
 </div>
 </div>
<p>直接在命令行或在终端配置文件(如<code>.zshrc</code>)中设置变量<code>GPG_TTY</code></p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">export</span> <span class="nv">GPG_TTY</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="k">$(</span>tty<span class="k">)</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="参考" class="heading-element"><span>参考</span>
 <a href="#%e5%8f%82%e8%80%83" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ul>
<li><a href="https://docs.github.com/zh/authentication/managing-commit-signature-verification"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">管理提交签名验证 - Github</a></li>
</ul>

item.title: SSH Notes
item.description:
<p>SSH服务，全称为Secure Shell，是一种网络协议，为用户提供安全的远程访问和文件传输服务。</p>
<h2 id="ssh命令" class="heading-element"><span>ssh命令</span>
 <a href="#ssh%e5%91%bd%e4%bb%a4" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">ssh <span class="o">[</span>-p port<span class="o">]</span> username@address <span class="c1"># 连接远程服务器</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ssh -T git@github.com <span class="c1"># 测试 SSH 连接</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="ssh-keygen命令" class="heading-element"><span>ssh-keygen命令</span>
 <a href="#ssh-keygen%e5%91%bd%e4%bb%a4" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p><code>ssh-keygen</code>命令允许用户创建用于SSH公钥身份验证的密钥对，包括私钥和公钥。私钥应该被安全地保存在本地机器上，而公钥则可以复制到远程服务器上，以便进行无密码的SSH登录。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">ssh-keygen -t rsa</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><ul>
<li><code>-t</code>：指定生成密钥所用的算法（如rsa、ecdsa、ed25519等），不指定则使用默认算法</li>
<li><code>-C</code>：为密钥对添加注释</li>
<li><code>-b</code>：指定密钥的位数（长度）</li>
<li><code>-f</code>：指定私钥文件的路径，不指定路径默认在<code>~/.ssh</code>文件夹下，公钥文件名比私钥文件名多了<code>.pub</code></li>
</ul>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">ssh-keygen -R 123.45.67.89 <span class="c1"># 从 ~/.ssh/known_hosts 删除指定远程主机</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ssh-keygen -l -f ~/.ssh/id_rsa <span class="c1"># 查看指定公钥的指纹(fingerprint)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">ssh-keygen -l -f ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub <span class="c1"># 查看指定公钥的指纹(fingerprint)</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="passphrase" class="heading-element"><span>passphrase</span>
 <a href="#passphrase" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>生成公私钥对可选择是否生成passphrase。如果生成SSH公私钥对时，设置了passphrase，那么使用SSH连接服务器时需要输入passphrase。</p>
<h2 id="ssh-copy-id命令" class="heading-element"><span>ssh-copy-id命令</span>
 <a href="#ssh-copy-id%e5%91%bd%e4%bb%a4" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p><code>ssh-copy-id</code> 是一个用于将本地机器的 SSH 公钥复制到远程服务器的 <code>~/.ssh/authorized_keys</code> 文件的实用工具。这样做之后，你就可以通过SSH免密码登录到远程服务器了，前提是远程服务器的SSH配置允许使用公钥进行身份验证。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">ssh-copy-id <span class="o">[</span>-i <span class="o">[</span>identity_file<span class="o">]]</span> <span class="o">[</span>user@<span class="o">]</span>hostname</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><ul>
<li><code>-i [identity_file]</code>：指定公钥文件的路径。当只有一对公私钥可以不指定，当有多对公私钥时需要手动指定想要上传的公钥文件路径。</li>
<li><code>[user@]hostname</code>：指定远程服务器的用户名和主机名或IP地址。如果不指定用户名，将使用当前用户的用户名。</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="scp命令" class="heading-element"><span>scp命令</span>
 <a href="#scp%e5%91%bd%e4%bb%a4" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 拷贝文件</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">scp <span class="o">[</span>-P port<span class="o">]</span> <span class="o">[</span>localFilePath<span class="o">]</span> username@address:<span class="o">[</span>severPath<span class="o">]</span> <span class="c1"># 本地文件拷贝到远程服务器</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">scp <span class="o">[</span>-P port<span class="o">]</span> username@address:<span class="o">[</span>severFilePath<span class="o">]</span> <span class="o">[</span>localPath<span class="o">]</span> <span class="c1"># 远程服务器文件拷贝到本地</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><ul>
<li><code>-r</code>：递归复制整个目录</li>
<li><code>-v</code>：详细方式显示输出</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="ssh相关文件" class="heading-element"><span>SSH相关文件</span>
 <a href="#ssh%e7%9b%b8%e5%85%b3%e6%96%87%e4%bb%b6" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h3 id="sshid_ed25519" class="heading-element"><span>~/.ssh/id_ed25519</span>
 <a href="#sshid_ed25519" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>当生成一对SSH公私钥时，如果不指定文件路径，则公私钥文件会放在<code>~/.ssh</code>文件夹下，比如使用<code>ed25519</code>算法生成一对公私钥，那么默认的私钥文件名和公钥文件名分别是<code>id_ed25519</code>和<code>id_ed25519.pub</code></p>
<p>公钥文件的内容示例</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">ssh-ed25519 AAAAC3NzaC1lZDI1NTE5AAAAINj This is a comment.</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>公钥文件内容分为三部分，以空格为分隔符。如上，第一部分<code>ssh-ed25519</code>表示该公钥是通过<code>ed25519</code>算法生成的，第二部分是公钥的主体部分，用于在 SSH 连接时验证用户的身份，第三部分是注释。</p>
<h3 id="sshconfig" class="heading-element"><span>~/.ssh/config</span>
 <a href="#sshconfig" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p><code>~/.ssh/config</code>是SSH配置文件的路径</p>
<p>格式</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">Host: hostName的别名
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">HostName: 是目标主机的ip地址
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">Port: 指定的端口号
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">User: 指定的登陆用户名
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">IdentityFile: 指定的私钥文件地址</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>示例</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span><span class="lnt">9
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">Host ubuntu
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">HostName 123.45.67.89
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">User star
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">Host myserver
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">HostName server.example.com
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">User myuser
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">Port 2222
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsa_myserver</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>配置完成后，后续可以使用<code>ssh ubuntu</code>代替<code>ssh star@123.45.67.89</code></p>
<h3 id="sshknown_hosts" class="heading-element"><span>~/.ssh/known_hosts</span>
 <a href="#sshknown_hosts" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p><code>~/.ssh/known_hosts</code> 是一个SSH客户端用来存储已知的远程主机公钥的文件。当首次通过SSH连接到一个新的远程主机时，SSH客户端会提示你接受该主机的公钥并将其添加到 <code>~/.ssh/known_hosts</code> 文件中。</p>
<p>可使用<code>ssh-keygen -R server.example.com</code>删除<code>~/.ssh/known_hosts</code>文件中远程主机。</p>
<h3 id="sshauthorized_keys" class="heading-element"><span>~/.ssh/authorized_keys</span>
 <a href="#sshauthorized_keys" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p><code>~/.ssh/authorized_keys</code> 文件是一个用于存储公钥的文件，允许SSH用户通过公钥认证方式登录到服务器，每一行代表一个公钥。比如使用<code>ssh-copy-id</code>将本机上的公钥拷贝到了远程主机，远程主机的该文件就会储存该公钥。</p>
<h2 id="github配置ssh" class="heading-element"><span>Github配置SSH</span>
 <a href="#github%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%aessh" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>在GitHub任意页的右上角，单击个人资料照片，然后单击<code>Settings</code>进入设置。</p>
<p><figure><img loading="lazy" src="./image/githuh-ssh-1.png" alt="githuh-ssh-1" srcset="./image/githuh-ssh-1.png?size=small, ./image/githuh-ssh-1.png?size=medium 1.5x, ./image/githuh-ssh-1.png?size=large 2x" data-title="githuh-ssh-1" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></figure></p>
<p>在<code>SSH and GPK keys</code>设置中点击<code>New SSH key</code></p>
<p><figure><img loading="lazy" src="./image/githuh-ssh-2.png" alt="githuh-ssh-2" srcset="./image/githuh-ssh-2.png?size=small, ./image/githuh-ssh-2.png?size=medium 1.5x, ./image/githuh-ssh-2.png?size=large 2x" data-title="githuh-ssh-2" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></figure></p>
<p><code>Title</code>自定义取个名字，<code>Key type</code>默认的<code>Authentication Key</code>即可，将本地的公钥文件的内容复制到<code>Key</code>中，保存。</p>
<p><figure><img loading="lazy" src="./image/githuh-ssh-3.png" alt="githuh-ssh-3" srcset="./image/githuh-ssh-3.png?size=small, ./image/githuh-ssh-3.png?size=medium 1.5x, ./image/githuh-ssh-3.png?size=large 2x" data-title="githuh-ssh-3" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></figure></p>
<h3 id="报错" class="heading-element"><span>报错</span>
 <a href="#%e6%8a%a5%e9%94%99" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="details admonition failure open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title">
 <i class="icon fa-solid fa-times-circle fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>失败<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>
 </div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content">ssh: connect to host github.com port 22: Operation timed out</div>
 </div>
 </div>
<p>在<code>SSH</code>的配置文件<code>~/.ssh/config</code>添加如下配置</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">Host github.com
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">HostName ssh.github.com
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">Port <span class="m">443</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="ubuntu上使用ssh服务" class="heading-element"><span>Ubuntu上使用SSH服务</span>
 <a href="#ubuntu%e4%b8%8a%e4%bd%bf%e7%94%a8ssh%e6%9c%8d%e5%8a%a1" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">apt install openssh-server <span class="c1"># 安装 SSH 服务</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># service 命令是较旧的方式，仍然可用以兼容老旧系统。</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">service ssh status <span class="c1"># 查看 SSH 状态</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">service ssh start <span class="c1"># 启动 SSH 服务</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">service ssh restart <span class="c1"># 重启 SSH 服务</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">service ssh stop <span class="c1"># 停止 SSH 服务</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># systemctl 是更现代的命令，适用于使用 systemd 的系统，提供更丰富的功能和信息。</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">systemctl status ssh <span class="c1"># 查看 SSH 状态</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">systemctl start ssh <span class="c1"># 启动 SSH 服务</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">systemctl restart ssh <span class="c1"># 重启 SSH 服务</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">systemctl stop ssh <span class="c1"># 停止 SSH 服务</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">systemctl <span class="nb">enable</span> ssh <span class="c1"># 启用开机自启</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">systemctl disable ssh <span class="c1"># 禁用开机自启</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="参考资料" class="heading-element"><span>参考资料</span>

item.title: Git Notes
item.description:
<p><code>Git</code>相关介绍、常用命令总结及使用过程中的遇到的相关问题记录</p>
<h2 id="git相关知识" class="heading-element"><span>Git相关知识</span>
 <a href="#git%e7%9b%b8%e5%85%b3%e7%9f%a5%e8%af%86" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h3 id="git工作区域" class="heading-element"><span>Git工作区域</span>
 <a href="#git%e5%b7%a5%e4%bd%9c%e5%8c%ba%e5%9f%9f" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><pre class="mermaid">flowchart LR
work[[Workspace
工作区]]
stage[(Stage
暂存区)]
repo[(Repository
版本库)]
remote[(Remote
远程仓库)]

work-->|git add|stage
stage-->|git commit
git commit --amend|repo
stage-->|git restore --staged|work
repo-->|git push|remote
repo-->|git reset --soft|stage
repo-->|git reset --mixed|work
repo-->|git commit --amend|repo
remote-->|git fetch|repo
remote-->|git pull| work
remote-->|git clone| work</pre>
<template>flowchart LR
work[[Workspace
工作区]]
stage[(Stage
暂存区)]
repo[(Repository
版本库)]
remote[(Remote
远程仓库)]

work-->|git add|stage
stage-->|git commit
git commit --amend|repo
stage-->|git restore --staged|work
repo-->|git push|remote
repo-->|git reset --soft|stage
repo-->|git reset --mixed|work
repo-->|git commit --amend|repo
remote-->|git fetch|repo
remote-->|git pull| work
remote-->|git clone| work</template><ul>
<li><strong>工作区</strong>：就是在电脑里能看到的目录。</li>
<li><strong>版本库</strong>：工作区有一个隐藏目录<code>.git</code>，这个不算工作区，而是 Git 的版本库。</li>
<li><strong>暂存区</strong>：英文叫stage或index。对应<code>.git</code>目录下的<code>index</code>文件。</li>
<li><strong>远程仓库</strong>：托管代码的服务器，<code>Github</code>等。</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="文件状态" class="heading-element"><span>文件状态</span>
 <a href="#%e6%96%87%e4%bb%b6%e7%8a%b6%e6%80%81" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><pre class="mermaid">flowchart LR
untracked([untracked])
modified([modified
tracked])
staged([staged])
committed([committed])
delete[Deletion]
undo[Undo changes to modified files]

untracked & modified-->|git add|staged
staged-->|git commit|committed
staged-->|git restore --staged|untracked & modified
modified-.->|git restore|undo
untracked-.->|git clean|delete
committed-.->|git rm|delete
modified & staged-.->|git rm -f |delete
modified & staged & committed -->|git rm --cached|untracked</pre>
<template>flowchart LR
untracked([untracked])
modified([modified
tracked])
staged([staged])
committed([committed])
delete[Deletion]
undo[Undo changes to modified files]

untracked & modified-->|git add|staged
staged-->|git commit|committed
staged-->|git restore --staged|untracked & modified
modified-.->|git restore|undo
untracked-.->|git clean|delete
committed-.->|git rm|delete
modified & staged-.->|git rm -f |delete
modified & staged & committed -->|git rm --cached|untracked</template><ul>
<li><strong>未跟踪（untrack）</strong>：表示文件为新增加的。</li>
<li><strong>已修改（modified/tracked）</strong>：表示修改了文件，但还没保存到git仓库中。</li>
<li><strong>已暂存（staged）</strong>：表示对一个已修改文件的当前版本做了标记，使之包含在下次提交的快照中。</li>
<li><strong>已提交（committed）</strong>：表示文件已保存在git仓库中。</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="git命令" class="heading-element"><span>Git命令</span>
 <a href="#git%e5%91%bd%e4%bb%a4" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><table>

 <tr>

 <tbody>
 <tr>

 </tr>
 <tr>

 <td style="text-align: left"><a href="#git-pull">git pull</a></td>
 <td style="text-align: left"><a href="#git-push">git push</a></td>
 <td style="text-align: left"><a href="#git-rebase">git rebase</a></td>

 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left"><a href="#git-remote">git remote</a></td>
 <td style="text-align: left"><a href="#git-reset">git reset</a></td>
 <td style="text-align: left"><a href="#git-restore">git restore</a></td>

<h3 id="相关概念" class="heading-element"><span>相关概念</span>
 <a href="#%e7%9b%b8%e5%85%b3%e6%a6%82%e5%bf%b5" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><ul>
<li>
<p><code>HEAD</code> 代表了当前工作目录所指向的当前分支的最新提交。<code>HEAD^</code>表示上一个版本，<code>HEAD^^</code>表示上上一个版本，<code>^</code>个数不限，几个<code>^</code>表示落后<code>HEAD</code>几个版本；<code>HEAD~5</code>表示落后<code>HEAD</code>5个版本。</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><code>origin</code>是一个远程仓库的默认名称，这个名称并不是强制的，它代表了远程仓库的地址。<code>origin main</code>和<code>origin/main</code>含义相同，表示远程仓库的<code>main</code>分支。再比如 <code>origin/HEAD</code>表示远程仓库默认分支的最新提交，<code>origin v1.0.0</code>表示远程仓库tag为<code>v1.0.0</code>的那次提交。</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>上游分支：本地分支一般会与远程仓库的某个分支相关联，关联的这个远程分支就称作是这个本地分支的上游分支。</p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="git-config" class="heading-element"><span>git config</span>
 <a href="#git-config" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>Git配置级别主要有以下3类：</p>
<ol>
<li>
<p>仓库级别local【优先级最高】，对应的文件是仓库下的<code>.git/config</code></p>
</li>
<li>
<p>用户级别global【优先级次之】，对应的文件是<code>~/.gitconfig</code></p>
</li>
<li>
<p>系统级别system【优先级最低】</p>
</li>
</ol>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git config -l <span class="c1"># 查看所有配置</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git config --local -l <span class="c1"># 查看仓库配置</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git config --global -l <span class="c1"># 用户全局配置</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git config --system -l <span class="c1"># 系统配置</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git config --global user.name &lt;name&gt; <span class="c1"># 设置用户名</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git config --global user.email &lt;email&gt; <span class="c1"># 设置邮箱</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git config --unset config_name <span class="c1"># 删除某个配置</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git config --global -e/--edit <span class="c1"># 编辑配置文件，该命令会显示配置文件的路径</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git config --global init.defaultBranch main <span class="c1"># 修改默认分支</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git config pull.rebase <span class="nb">false</span> <span class="c1"># 在一个git仓库中，不带--system和--global参数，配置的就是仓库级别</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="git-init" class="heading-element"><span>git init</span>
 <a href="#git-init" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git init <span class="c1"># 初始化，采用默认分支名称。默认分支名称可通过 git config 来配置</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git init -b branch_name <span class="c1"># 初始化，并指定分支名称</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>

</div><h3 id="git-clone" class="heading-element"><span>git clone</span>
 <a href="#git-clone" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>将远程仓库克隆到本地</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git clone url <span class="c1"># 克隆某个仓库</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git clone url &lt;local_path&gt; <span class="c1"># 克隆的文件放在指定文件夹下</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git clone --branch &lt;branch_name/tag_name&gt; url <span class="c1"># 克隆某个分支或标签</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git clone url --depth <span class="m">3</span> <span class="c1"># 只下载最近3次的提交历史，下载完后通过 git log 也只会看到最近3次提交记录</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><code>git clone</code>加了参数<code>--depth</code>之后，执行<code>git fetch --unshallow</code>可获取完整的仓库历史记录。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git clone --recursive url</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>当使用<code>git clone</code>命令克隆一个包含子模块的仓库时，Git会克隆主仓库，但不会自动克隆子模块目录中的内容。子模块目录会保留，但会是空的，或者包含指向提交对象的占位符（通常是一个特殊的提交，表示子模块指向的特定版本）。当在<code>git clone</code>命令中加上<code>--recursive</code>参数时，Git不仅会克隆主仓库，还会自动地初始化并克隆仓库中所有的子模块。</p>
<p>如果已经克隆了一个仓库但没有使用<code>--recursive</code>参数，可以在之后通过<code>git submodule update --init --recursive</code>命令来初始化并更新子模块。</p>
<h3 id="git-add" class="heading-element"><span>git add</span>
 <a href="#git-add" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>将文件放入暂存区</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git add . <span class="c1"># 将当前文件夹下的文件和文件夹都放入暂存区</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git add file1 file2 <span class="c1"># 将指定文件/文件夹放入暂存区</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="git-commit" class="heading-element"><span>git commit</span>
 <a href="#git-commit" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>将暂存区中文件提交到版本库</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git commit -m &lt;message&gt; <span class="c1"># 提交暂存区中的文件到版本库</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git commit <span class="c1"># 以交互的方式填写提交信息</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git commit --amend <span class="c1"># 修改最近一次的提交信息，如果此时暂存区中有文件，则暂存区中的文件也会被提交到版本库</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 该命令仅修改最新提交的用户名和邮箱，比如修改了配置中的 user.name 和 user.email 之后可使用该命令</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git commit --amend --reset-author</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="git-push" class="heading-element"><span>git push</span>
 <a href="#git-push" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>将版本库中推导远程仓库</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span><span class="lnt">9
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git push <span class="c1"># 将当前分支推到上游分支，当前与上游分支的名称一致才可以使用该命令，否则报错提醒名称不匹配</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git push origin branch_name <span class="c1"># 将本地main分支(注意不是当前分支)推到远程仓库指定分支</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git push origin &lt;local-branch&gt;:&lt;remote-branch&gt; <span class="c1"># 将本地的指定分支推送到远程仓库的指定分支</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git push -f <span class="c1"># 强制推到远程仓库，比如落后远程仓库时强制推到远程仓库，则会使远程仓库的版本回退</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git push origin :branch_name <span class="c1"># 删除远端分支</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git push origin v1.0.0 <span class="c1"># 推送指定标签到远程仓库</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git push origin --tags <span class="c1"># 推送所有标签到远程仓库</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git push origin :refs/tags/v1.0.0 <span class="c1"># 删除远程标签</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git push --dry-run <span class="c1"># 模拟推送操作，而不实际将更改推送到远程仓库</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-fallback" data-lang="fallback"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git push --all</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>这个命令会推送所有本地分支到远程仓库，如果远程仓库中已经存在同名分支，它们将被更新；如果不存在，则会在远程仓库中创建与本地分支同名的新分支。各个本地分支是否有上游分支、其上游分支是不是与本地分支同名，这些对该命令都没有影响。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git push -u origin branch_name</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>将本地<code>branch_name</code>分支推到远程仓库的<code>branch_name</code>分支上，并设置当前分支的上游分支为远程仓库的<code>branch_name</code>分支。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git push -u origin local-branch:remote-branch</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>将本地<code>local-branch</code>分支推到远程仓库的<code>remote-branch</code>分支上，并设置当前分支的上游分支为远程仓库的<code>branch_name</code>分支。</p>
<div class="details admonition note open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title">
 <i class="icon fa-solid fa-pencil-alt fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>注意<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>
 </div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content">先<code>git branch --set-upstream-to</code>再<code>git push</code>，与<code>git push -u</code>某些情况下等效。但是<code>git branch --set-upstream-to=origin/branch_name</code>要求<code>origin/branch_name</code>是已存在的分支。而<code>git push -u</code>对于空仓库也可以，它会为这个空仓库创建这个分支并将本地相关分支推上去，同时设置上游分支。</div>
 </div>
 </div>
<h3 id="git-remote" class="heading-element"><span>git remote</span>
 <a href="#git-remote" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git remote add origin git@github.com:user_name/repository_name.git <span class="c1"># 关联远端仓库</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git remote remove origin <span class="c1"># 移除与远端仓库的关联</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git remote -v <span class="c1"># 查看远程仓库地址</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><div class="details admonition note open">
 <div class="details-summary admonition-title">
 <i class="icon fa-solid fa-pencil-alt fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>注意<i class="details-icon fa-solid fa-angle-right fa-fw" aria-hidden="true"></i>
 </div>
 <div class="details-content">
 <div class="admonition-content"><code>git remote add origin</code>只是关联远程仓库地址，没有获取远程仓库分支的信息；此时运行<code>git branch -r</code>就会发现为空（即使关联的是一个非空仓库），运行命令<code>git branch --set-upstream-to=origin/main</code>也会报错（即使远程仓库存在<code>main</code>分支）。</div>
 </div>
 </div>
<h3 id="git-fetch" class="heading-element"><span>git fetch</span>
 <a href="#git-fetch" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>获取远程仓库最新信息。比如远程仓库已经有一些新的提交，<code>git pull</code>是直接下载最新代码到本地，<code>git fetch</code>不会下载最新的代码，只是获取仓库的最新信息，<code>git fetch</code> 之后可通过<code>git status</code>看到落后上游分支，也可通过<code>git log origin/branch_name</code>查看最新<code>log</code>信息。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git fetch <span class="c1"># 获取当前分支的上游远程仓库（如origin）的最新信息</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git fetch --all <span class="c1"># 获取所有配置的远程仓库的最新信息</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git fetch origin <span class="c1"># 获取origin这个远程仓库的最新信息</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git fetch origin main <span class="c1"># 只获取origin这个远程仓库main分支的信息</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git fetch --unshallow</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>比如<code>git clone --depth 1</code>只会下载最近一次提交记录，现在需要完整的仓库历史记录，可以使用 <code>git fetch --unshallow</code>使其包含完整的提交历史。</p>
<h3 id="git-pull" class="heading-element"><span>git pull</span>
 <a href="#git-pull" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git pull <span class="c1"># 拉取上游分支的代码</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git pull origin main <span class="c1"># 拉取指定远程仓库的指定分支的代码</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>如果当前分支不存在上游分支，需要先设置一下上游分支再<code>git pull</code>，或者用<code>git pull origin main</code>指定远程仓库名称和远程分支名称。</p>
<pre class="mermaid">%%{init: {'gitGraph': {'mainBranchName': 'origin/main'}} }%%
gitGraph
commit id: "C1"
commit id: "C2"
branch main
commit id: "C3"
checkout origin/main
commit id: "C5"
checkout main
commit id: "C4"
checkout origin/main
commit id: "C6"
checkout main</pre>
<template>%%{init: {'gitGraph': {'mainBranchName': 'origin/main'}} }%%
gitGraph
commit id: "C1"
commit id: "C2"
branch main
commit id: "C3"
checkout origin/main
commit id: "C5"
checkout main
commit id: "C4"
checkout origin/main
commit id: "C6"
checkout main</template><p>如果远程分支和本地分支处于不同的提交节点，直接<code>git pull</code>不行，需指定<code>git pull</code>的行为方式</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 采用 git rebase 的方式合并本地的提交和远程的提交</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 下面两条命令等效</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git pull --rebase
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git pull --rebase<span class="o">=</span><span class="nb">true</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 或者添加配置设置 git pull 的默认行为，再使用 git pull</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git config <span class="o">[</span>--global<span class="o">]</span> pull.rebase <span class="nb">true</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git pull</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 采用 git merge 的方式合并本地的提交和远程的提交</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 下面两条命令等效</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git pull --no-rebase
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git pull --rebase<span class="o">=</span><span class="nb">false</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 或者添加配置设置 git pull 的默认行为，再使用 git pull</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git config <span class="o">[</span>--global<span class="o">]</span> pull.rebase <span class="nb">false</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git pull</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><code>git pull</code>过程中可能会遇到冲突。<code>git pull --rebase</code>解决冲突的方法与<code>git rebase</code>解决冲突的方法一样，<code>git pull --no-rebase</code>解决冲突的方法与<code>git merge</code>解决冲突的方法一样。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 只有当本地分支是当前远程分支的直接祖先时，这个命令才会成功执行。</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git pull --ff-only
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 或者添加配置设置 git pull 的默认行为，再使用 git pull</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git config <span class="o">[</span>--global<span class="o">]</span> pull.ff only
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git pull</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>以参数<code>--rebase, --no-rebase, --ff-only</code>的形式指定<code>git pull</code>的行为的优先级高于配置文件指定<code>git pull</code>的行为。</p>

<h3 id="git-branch" class="heading-element"><span>git branch</span>
